channel.title: Auth system?
channel.description:
Hey guys i was wondering if you knew how to set up an auth system? I have a website and can host it there. This is for a java script that runs with Nexus Ibot.
If you guys are interested in an Auto-Fighter:
[[Actually, I thought it'd be better if I did it.]]
Works with the free version of the bot. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] I would suggest removing that link from your post. Buying and selling here is not permitted.[/center]

item.title: Auth system?
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

didn’t the ultimate mager have an auth system? Ide talk to the person who made that, or soemthing, maybe try to talk to Starblaster100 and people like that also because they know how to set up a good auth system you can base yours off of.

Read full topic
